plot: A gypsy cures the wound that a snake inflicts on Caperucita. The Wolf, the Dog and the Skunk befriend a little girl, but incomprehension makes them go back to the wild life.
title: Caperucita y sus tres amigos
plot_es: A gypsy cures the wound that a snake inflicts on Caperucita. The Wolf, the Dog and the Skunk befriend a little girl, but incomprehension makes them go back to the wild life.
plot_en: A gypsy cures the wound that a snake inflicts on Caperucita. The Wolf, the Dog and the Skunk befriend a little girl, but incomprehension makes them go back to the wild life.
